name: Captain Jack Hero Destroyer
description:
You can save them, Jack!

Please save all the hostages and don't kill any of them!!

All human lives are precious and deserve saving, the opposite of death!!!

-= CONTROLS =-

A/D -- Move Left / Right

SPACE -- Jump / Double Jump

CLICK MOUSE -- Shoot

 -= CREDITS =-

Made by THEAXE_GAMES in 20 hours for BEAN JAM # 20 LET'S GO!!!
